name: 鄭瑞清
objective: This course will introduce the basic concept of microwave engineering including transmission line theory and basic transmission line medium. Then, the design of several passive mutli-ports circuits, including resonators, couplers and filters will be introduced.
schedule:
1	Electromagnetic Theory (I)
2	Electromagnetic Theory (II)
3	Electromagnetic Theory (III)
4	Transmission Line Theory
5	Transmission Lines and Waveguides (I)
6	Transmission Lines and Waveguides (II)
7	Microwave Network Analysis (I)
8	Microwave Network Analysis (II)
9	Mid-Term Exam
10	Impedance Matching and Tuning
11	Microwave Resonators (I)
12	Microwave Resonators (II)
13	Power Dividers and Directional Couplers (I)
14	Power Dividers and Directional Couplers (II)
15	Microwave Filters (I)
16	Microwave Filters (II)
17	Microwave Filters (III)
18	Final Exam
materials: Textbook: David M. Pozar,“Microwave Engineering,” David M. Pozar, 4th  Edition, Addison-Wesley Publishing Company Inc., 2011.
